heading: Gravity Chess
description: both players move in the same direction, trying to stack pieces higher. (2 players, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Two Move Chess
description: both players choose two pieces to move each turn, but choosing the same piece cancels out. (2 players, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Parade Chess Solitaire
description: pieces move each other into a connected group. (1 player, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Booster Chess
description: use cards to boost your chess army. (2 players, chess set, checkers set, and deck of cards)

heading: Neighbour Chess Solitaire
description: moves pieces using their neighbours' moves to form one connected group. (1 player, chess set, and deck of cards)

heading: Cloak and Dagger Chess
description: is a game where you disguise your chess pieces as checkers, then try to identify your opponent's pieces. (2 players, chess set, checkers set, pen, and tape)
